meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Karen Conley Cynthia Green Barbara-Anne Eddy Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #794.

div.div:
Barbara-Anne Eddy game 4.
Final Jeopardy! logo flashes on the game board's monitors instead of the show's logo.

td.p: Karen Conley, an airline customer service agent from Burlington, Kentucky
Cynthia Green, a journalist from Tarrytown, New York
Barbara-Anne Eddy, a freelance researcher from Vancouver, Canada (whose 3-day cash winnings total $30,400)

tr.td: CANADA
ART
'87 ANNIVERSARIES
(Alex: There were a number of important anniversaries last year & this is our way of paying tribute to those.)
BASEBALL
MUSICAL JEWELRY
5-LETTER WORDS

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Karen: What is French?)

English

Barbara-AnneKaren
')

tr.td: Barbara-Anne
Cynthia
Karen

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Barbara-Anne
Cynthia
Karen
PRESIDENTS
ENGINEERING
"B" MOVIES
HISTORICAL DRAMA
THE ERA
[Alex pronounced the category title as shown, like in the reference to time.]
5-LETTER WOODS
(Alex: And this will be the last time you will ever see a "Woods" category on our program!)
